Reviews.Content: The product was delivered on time, although they called it refurbished it looks brand new. Seems to work pedfectly.  The only criticism I have is Samsung doesn't tech service doesn't do tech service for their own refurbished product. One of my pet peeves is all this high tech gadgets are great and useful tools , however nobody shows you how to use them or wants to support them. That goes for software and hardware. You have to be technically adept or watch utube videos to learn how to use the brand new high tech stuff you just bought. About the Samsung Tab 3 refurbished unit, it works great and will be a useful tool in my bag.

Reviews.Title: Incredible tablet!
Reviews.Author: Shaquille Wolef
Reviews.Content: Few complaints!It does everything I need!The battery lasts a very long time regardless of whether I use a lot of apps or not. I like that I can watch a least a full movie on here without plugging it into something. I often go on long random walks, and I can trust this tablet to still have power as I go.The pictures and videos are pretty great, but there is definitely room for improvement because you don't always have the clearest picture if the lighting isn't great.Sometimes, the speed hasn't been what I expected, but I have only seen that when I have about 10 apps running. Otherwise, it is great! :)I also find it to be a big deal that it has a microSD slot that is well protected!Overall, it is a lovely product! :)

Reviews.Title: as I do to free up the table
Reviews.Author: ALexander malave
Reviews.Content: as I do to free up the table  its producer network original data because in Venezuela there is no such telco

Reviews.Title: Brilliantly designed
Reviews.Author: Vaughn Jackson
Reviews.Content: This device is everything I wanted and got. It continues to amaze me with all of the capabilities it can do.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Rachael Perez
Reviews.Content: The best tablet ever bought but sadly i lost mine but i had a lot of fun with it, the internet was fast wifi worked great and the music was super loud when you connect it to a radio it the most amazing products ever i recommend it and I love it and i wish to buy another one

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Steve Bittorf
Reviews.Content: The Samsung galaxy tab 3 is better than the tab 2 for my purposes, i.e. kindle, video, web browsing and processing credit card payments through square. The response seems slower than the tab 2. I would recommend it

Reviews.Title: Quality, affordable tablet.
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: My one year old recently broke my old Dell Streak tablet that he watched movies on while on long drives. I was looking for something quality enough to use every day but cheap enough to replace if necessary. I came across this tablet and purchased with the SquareTrade protection plan. I have not been disappointed in this tablet. It is quick enough to me to use to check Facebook, do some online banking and light web browsing and easy enough for him to watch his movie on. I did purchase the Bobj rugged case and in the couple of months we have had this, it has hit the ground several times with no issues. Great tablet for adults and kids alike.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: C Sherlock
Reviews.Content: I can't seem to put the tablet down. It's my mini computer and it fits in my smallest purse! It arrived early, it's a great price, convenient, and in new condition.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this tablet! my daughter bought one for her children for Christmas.  After trying it, I had to buy one for myself. The price is reasonable, the tablet is more than i hoped for. I would recommend this to anyone and everyone looking for a smaller size tablet.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Jerry Lindsay
Reviews.Content: I bout this for my son and I for games a browsing.  We like it a lot.  Great deal and price.

Reviews.Title: Love my Samsung
Reviews.Author: Darlene Konateh
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful having lots of fun with it .  I love how I can down load a lot of stuff my daughter loves it more cause she can play the games on it

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me
Reviews.Author: Jocelyn Beauregard
Reviews.Content: I started out trying to go as cheap as possible.  Big mistake to get no-name cheapo product and expect too much. Samsung Galaxy is way less expensive than apple, but offers a great tablet that is more than sufficient for my needs.  I definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great product, but beware of warehouse deals
Reviews.Author: Carson P.
Reviews.Content: Ordered one of these from the warehouse, like I have other electronics.  I've always been happy with the Warehouse deals, but this was extremely disappointing.  It was garage sale quality packaging at best, original but beat to hell.  The actual unit had smudges and dirt on it, as if it had been under someones car seat.  Amazon, I'm willing to buy opened used items at a discount, but this was unbelievable.

Reviews.Title: Bad USB micro port
Reviews.Author: George S. Rizk
Reviews.Content: in the beginning it used to stop charging because some manufacture defect in the charging port and within 4 months stop charging. I send it to Samsung for repair and the answer I got was it is my fault!!I called the customer service to complain about that decision and they transfer me to the executive customer relations and when I explain the issue they told me the only thing they can do is call the repair center and tell them my point of view.So, I asked to speak to a supervisor and the answer was NO!! yes the answer was NO!

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: V. Cecere "gryffindor10"
Reviews.Content: I had ordered this because I had thought my Galaxy Tab 2 had died. It has since come back to life but that is cool cus now I have 2 tablets. I would give the Tab 3 a 5 star rating except for one annoying thing. Quite often when I am online on this tablet all of a sudden I won't be able to bring a site up, it says unavailable check your network connection and I look and it says I am connected. I have to shut the wifi off and then put it back on again so it will recognize that it is connected and then I can continue what I was doing. I can't understand why it does this but it is not that big of a deal overall it is a great tablet the same as the Tab 2 was. Actually the Tab 2 would do that internet connection thing once in a while too but not as often as the Tab 3. Overall I am very happy with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet its small and super light the resolution is great. The battery lasts for quite awhile thats a good thing.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Denise S.
Reviews.Content: Great buy. Brought it for myself but my 3yr old seem to taken over it n downloads everything. Would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excelent tab for its price.
Reviews.Author: Ortodontic
Reviews.Content: Very easy and fast tab, very low cost tablet, I bought white color because its cheaper...and I dont use other than ipad at home.

Reviews.Title: I love Samsung
Reviews.Author: Franco Osuna
Reviews.Content: I'm a big fan of Samsung and android. This is a mix that rules.easy to use and well prepared for work

Reviews.Title: Bigger Version of Phone
Reviews.Author: Sierra
Reviews.Content: This tablet is just like a bigger version of my phone. I initially bought it to read and listen to music on while I was at work and it's honestly great for that. It can be a bit slow and I don't like that but its such a minor detail. A great buy!

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Sharon M. Prinz "Applesauce"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful, just what I wanted.  I love my Kindle Fire HD, but find it alittle too large to carry around in my handbag.  This unit is just perfect, does everything and so easy.  Great bargain...

Reviews.Title: looking for great deals.
Reviews.Author: Katrina Bills "movie lover"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it. My neice set it up for me. Im not good at technology. But I use it toserf the intrrnet. Its been a godsend to me. Sometimes the internet gets slow, but its great for such a great price. I would recommend it to otherrs. Thank u very much...i was going to add is yes it has a headset jack an 1 R blaster. And if I use it alot I charge it everyday. It looks like it has speakers also by the charger port. Hope that helps. Im not good with technology like I said. But I love it.

Reviews.Title: love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Sherry Woody
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a Kindle at Christmas and thank heavens my daughter talked me in to buying this instead.  It was a model behind which made it really affordable and still has all the whistles and bells I want , plus I love the size.  Btw  I just downloaded Kindle to my tablet so i have the best of both worlds.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: NoCoast Photo
Reviews.Content: I bought this Galaxy Tab for my wife as a Christmas gift. She loves it, can't keep her off it. Battery lasts hours and the quality of the speaker is as good as to be expected. I'm a fan of the Android OS, this tablet uses Jelly Bean 4.1.

Reviews.Title: Awesomeness
Reviews.Author: RiddleL
Reviews.Content: I bought this for myself to give my kindle to my kids.  I love it.  I also have a Samsung Galaxy phone and they were able to sync up.  I use it mostly for reading using my Kindle app but I have used it for other things and I love that I upgraded to this!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Hannah
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoyed having this (it's a great way to stay organized for my wedding and to surf the internet without turning on my laptop). It does tend to really lag in performance when you have it on Power Saving Mode (the battery still lasts for quite a while when Power Saving Mode is off). I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love this Tablet ! The best one yet !
Reviews.Author: ShemSwag
Reviews.Content: I've had this tablet for about a year now and I couldn't be happier with it ! It  has helped me through so many rough times in my life and I love how it feels in the hand. Don't buy an expensive Apple tablet when you could have one of these amazing Galaxy Tab 3 series. My only problem with this tablet is that it doesn't have the current Kitkat update as yet and multi-windowing is not available. Hopefully, this will be fixed in the KitKat update !

Reviews.Title: this item is a very good product
Reviews.Author: natasha
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet I brought it for a good friend of mines an he loves it hes always on this tablet

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: leidy
Reviews.Content: Thanks for all the tablet is in perfect condition, arrived on time and costs. ue only thing of note the lack of rest every perfect headphones

Reviews.Title: super easy to use
Reviews.Author: Brenda Boeldt "brenda"
Reviews.Content: Its not as fast as I wanted, but is super easy to use... just a bigger version of my smart phone... :-)

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Wayne King
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a trial to have my staff use this in the field for custodial inspections and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Yes
Reviews.Author: Jerry Solomon
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I got one for my son for Christmas and I really liked it. Glad I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great device but battery or charger cable issues
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: A pretty nifty little gadget. It's not a cellphone, it's not a pc, it's the perfect tablet. It fits comfortably on your hand and is not tiresome to hold but is not too small either.With this one I got an issue. One night it discharged completely and the next day it didn't wanted to turn on. Even after I left it charging for a long time. The next day I brought it to work and connected it to the pc for a long time. It worked perfectly fine afterwards.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Shannon S.
Reviews.Content: So far after 3 months no complaints definitely would recommend this product or buy it again :-) that's  it :)

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Joseph Baker
Reviews.Content: I am completely technologically illiterate but I have seen my co workers with tablets similar to this and I had to have one.  I have been slowly learning what this little machine can do and I am more than satisfied with it!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: GUILLERMO FIORENZA
Reviews.Content: Good product. It easy collocation and the quality is excellent, I tested that with my child and has a good ressistent.

Reviews.Title: the bomb
Reviews.Author: Adrienne Murphy
Reviews.Content: my aunt really love her new toy u can do everything from this tablet I will recommend it to others thanks

Reviews.Title: excellent team
Reviews.Author: JESUS L ACOSTA P
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very practical and comfortable to use, helped me a lot to synchronize multiple computers in my house with the apps that I downloaded, and you can download an endless number of applications to be used, I have no complaints of this tablet, it has simplified my many of my tasks both at home and at work.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Purchased these for my kids to read on at school (Middle School and High School) and they work perfect.  They loaded them up with apps and it still runs fast. Great buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Travella Williams
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my mother and she loves her new tablet 3 . Thanks a lot amazon. Very appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tab
Reviews.Author: Gaby
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 works Beautifully. The only setback would be that unlike the Tab 2 where I was store applications on my micro SD card with ease. This version makes storing applications on your SD card a bit more complicated. Just google it and follow the instructions on how to do it. Other than that,  I have no complaints. Don't hesitate to buy because you wont regret it.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Olayinka Bolaji
Reviews.Content: This samsung galaxy tab met all my expectations, deserves a 5 star really, love the color. I recommend this for anyone looking for a tab

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Dak
Reviews.Content: A very nice, reliable tablet. I got this for my granddaughter and she can't get enough of it. She watches her movies, has downloaded Skype, and plays lots of games.

Reviews.Title: Olivia Diana Mayberry, Teacher
Reviews.Author: Olivia Diana Mayberry
Reviews.Content: Excellent.  A gift for my son.  He is very pleased.  I was happy as well because it is kind of difficulty to get a gift for a male with so many advances in technology. Thanks for having great merchandise on hand.  Olivia Diana

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for our kids.
Reviews.Author: Eddie
Reviews.Content: We are really happy with our Samsung tablets for the kids. Really great product, by a reliable manufacturer. Absolutely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy tablet 3
Reviews.Author: E. Riollano
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my son and he loved it from the moment he began using it.  Now it goes with him everywhere he goes.  Definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this new tab. The screen is crystal clear and everything is working just as advertised.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: Have not as of yet explored everything but thus far what I have done with it I have been very pleased with. Love the camera and the videos it takes.

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Ruthann Porter
Reviews.Content: This is  a great tablet for a 1st time user. I love the white and its perfect for what I do . Play games, email and search. The battery seems to be fine for me. Its just the right size and can fit in your pocket book. great to take on a trip. I trust Samsung that was a plus when I was looking .

Reviews.Title: 7 inch Tablet
Reviews.Author: Terry L.
Reviews.Content: For the money you can't go wrongI bought 3 of these as gifts, never had any problemsEvery one I purchased for I asked , they love themEasy to use

Reviews.Title: perfect!
Reviews.Author: Lolablue
Reviews.Content: Fast wifi coneccion,  I dont have any issues wherever I go I can conect easily, very happy with my tablet.

Reviews.Title: Excellent device
Reviews.Author: yshaq
Reviews.Content: Very Good tablet for his size, his velocity . Very excellent model.Unfortunately no simple card slot for the Internet connection.This model is good for quick utilization.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet
Reviews.Author: Eric Hayes
Reviews.Content: To be so compact and easy to carry around, it would seem like it wouldn't do very much, but that's the exact opposite. Also with Samsung's high quality camera, it is the only digital camera you need.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Toya
Reviews.Content: I'm so in love with my tablet.... I haven't really put it down since I brought it.. I'll recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dayana Alvarado
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, the tablet is very practical and comfortable, loved the price and quality. I recommend it to everyone, whether children or adults.

Reviews.Title: IT'S PERFECT!
Reviews.Author: Rebeca Trujillo
Reviews.Content: Everything about the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 is ideal. Very portable. Great screen resolution. Crisp colors, Fast performance. It's PERFECT!

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy tab 7
Reviews.Author: Conney
Reviews.Content: This little device is the best. It's my personal and private little computer. I would recommend it to every one. The greatest. I love it.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dale Walls Sr.
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about this tablet.  This is my first (I was using a laptop).  Screen is the right size.  HD is AWESOME!!!  Screen gets kinda dirty from the fingers all the time but that's O.K.  Easy to use.  Connected to my network without a hiccup.  Like the apps you can get with it.  Overall, I am a happy camper!!!

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: susannie ellison
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet, I can't seem to put it down. Picture quality could be better though. Overall it is a great device.

Reviews.Title: A bit slow
Reviews.Author: Asher Fine
Reviews.Content: first of all its woth the price..second, it runs a bit slow and not very smooth.all in all it is a nice small tablet but not really a high performance tablet at all

Reviews.Title: not as good as the tab 2
Reviews.Author: Shaun Boyer "Shaun"
Reviews.Content: dont know how you can down grade with a new product but Samsung did it, not as fast and the screen seem to be a bit more dimmer

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: LEONARDO ANDRES ARIAS SOSA
Reviews.Content: THANKS FOR THE ARTICLE WAS RECEIVED IN PERFECT CONDITION. EXCELLENT QUALITY ITEMS AND I'M REALLY THANKFUL FOR YOUR GOOD WORK ... HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

Reviews.Title: Great device with a great price
Reviews.Author: Sharon K. Chiddister
Reviews.Content: I liked the price and Samsung is a very reputable  brand.  I almost wish I  would have bought the 8 or 10 inch.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Manuel Mendoza
Reviews.Content: Small, but too much, confortable, easy to use, expandable memory capability, wi-fi, fast web browsing, really liked this product and its features

Reviews.Title: Excellent item!!!
Reviews.Author: Isabel Rodriguez Peña
Reviews.Content: My Samsung Galaxy Tab is awesome, connects to Wi Fi super fast, it's small enough so I can carry it in my handbag,  has great resolution and I am super happy with it! It arrived super fast and in perfect condition!

Reviews.Title: Why Won't It Save to the External Memory Card?
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet purchase for me and perhaps my last. I've seen a lot of positive reviews for this product, so I don't understand why I'm having the issues I'm having. I'm just trying to save a picture(s) to the card and it won't let me. For example, when I select the camera and choose to save to the "memory card" I get a message as follows: "unable to save file to SD... transferring to internal memory" or at least some verbiage like that. I contacted Samsung customer support via online chat and was very unimpressed. Any one out there have some thoughts on how to resolve this problem? Otherwise, I think I will be looking to return. I didn't want to spend the big bucks on an Apple product, but gosh... if this is what you get with an Android device... maybe an iPad mini is worth the extra money. ??

Reviews.Title: Good price, Screen resolution/clariy sucks, old Android version
Reviews.Author: Anusha
Reviews.Content: I was expecting a better experience. I also own a Samsung Galaxy S4 phone & this Galaxy Tab 3 doesn't come close in terms of screen quality & overall experience. Not easy way to upgrade to new version of Android either. Lame! Disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good functionality for a small tablet
Reviews.Author: R. Chittenden
Reviews.Content: I have Nook, Kindle, and iPad, too, and find the Samsung to compare favorably except for its small size.  Unfortunately, it does not do what I bought it for which was to mirror to my Samsung TV and to act as a touch remote.  It will send saved video and photos to the tv but it will not mirror live streaming data or web browsing.  If you want to do.that buy the 8" tablet.  Apps download easily and I have not yet found any that are incompatible.  Don't worry about color choices if you are going to use a cover.

Reviews.Title: Small Tablet packs big punch
Reviews.Author: Kirk
Reviews.Content: I have an I-Pad and this is much easier to carry around and actually works better and easier for much less money.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: Diane Nagy
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I owned the galaxy s4 phone and loved it, so I figured this is exactly like it, already know how it functions, so glad I chose this over all the other tablets, and the price made it even better!!!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: greta
Reviews.Content: My daughter received this tablet a few weeks ago, and we have not experienced any problems. It was easy to set up and all worked well.

Reviews.Title: Best Android Tablet I have ever owned....
Reviews.Author: Ripped Off
Reviews.Content: This Tablet was a sweet price and included free shipping.... Well worth it! Would buy it again! I love it!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Dante Sovereign
Reviews.Content: I've been using this and the Tab 2 8gb, 1.2ghz wifi side by side to compare and I am impressed.  I have all of my backed up apps on it and it still runs very smoothly.  The 16gb and 1.5ghz processor definitely make a difference over the Tab 2.  I've only had it for a week and tend to only like to give a review after extensive use.  I may update later.

Reviews.Title: A good Christmas gift.
Reviews.Author: Judy Scholtens "reading grandma"
Reviews.Content: Two of my grandkids asked me to order this for them to give to their parents for aChristmas gift.  Good delivery time before the holiday and they are very satisfiedwith their gift.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on something else!
Reviews.Author: Lewis S.
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet. Runs well, decent memory. Added an 8 gig memory card to it and I can stream Netflix without issues or interruptions. The screen is on the smaller side, but for a budget tablet it is exactly what I needed. Bought another tablet (not a name brand) and it was dead within a week! This was worth every penny IMHO.

Reviews.Title: Samsung  Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: oldmodelT "oldmodelt"
Reviews.Content: These were purchased for the two older grand children. They were extremely happy with the tablets. They can do as much with these as I can with my clunky old Dell. Maybe next year, I better look to upgrade my own!

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: Celida Padilla
Reviews.Content: The perfect gift for my nice on her "quinceañera" birthdayShe loves her first tablet.En the price is very afortable.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Carlos L Luque
Reviews.Content: The Samsung brand, the tab specs and the price were the main attraction for me to buy this product. I will recommend this tab to friends and family

Reviews.Title: yeah for samsung
Reviews.Author: maurine mccurdy
Reviews.Content: Samsung galaxy 3 is everything I expected and wanted it to be. I love it. Easy to use, comfortable in my hand. My photos turn out absolutely fabulous. It does beautiful documents and my games are a blast

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Great product.  I wish communication it would be better but at the end I got s nice tablet that I'm really enjoying

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet for the mony
Reviews.Author: K. Vicari
Reviews.Content: I had a tab 2 and got the 3 which I like a lot better. It is easy to hold in your hands and the design is better it matches the phones.

Reviews.Title: The price is Great
Reviews.Author: wael elsedeki
Reviews.Content: Just get it it's the best price you will ever find anywhere world wide.Thank you. I love it so much

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for kids and Grown ups too.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Fabela
Reviews.Content: The package arrived at the time expected and i have to admit that my sister loved it. Is a great tablet and the price is also accessible. the only thing i would liked of the tablet was that it had android 4.2.2 jelly bean, but it doesn't. Besides that, the tablet is great for facebook, youtube, internet search and gaming. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: loving it
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: perfect for the life i have. will make running my life a lot easier. now i can work from anywhere.

Reviews.Title: The Best Tablet for me!!
Reviews.Author: MALAYA TONEY
Reviews.Content: THE Samsung Tab 3 is the perfect tablet for me. I can play games, watch YouTube and use the internet.  I love it

Reviews.Title: AmaZonazing
Reviews.Author: Mitgirl
Reviews.Content: Great for vídeos and i use it for taking notes as well. The only thing is that it takes a little while to save the document. Use a micro sd if you want to do the same. Reading is also nice, so find what books you can get for free!

Reviews.Title: Daughter's oh man
Reviews.Author: cheep
Reviews.Content: This little lady can reck anything, She had the ipad that did not last for 3 months so far the galaxy is holding it own from dirt the water the sticky foods and steam from bath room.

Reviews.Title: highly recommended
Reviews.Author: REDZZZ
Reviews.Content: love it....came on time..works good. everything as described packaging was good all in all a great buy. highly recommended to others

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Gerry
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet for my kids and they love it. Has a good camera and has a decent processor.  Delivery was very fast.

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy tab 3 (7inch , white)
Reviews.Author: samuel cambridge
Reviews.Content: it is ok to my satisfaction, the color and the performance works fine for me so i am fone with it

Reviews.Title: Buy it under 150, not the full price
Reviews.Author: Juan P.
Reviews.Content: A little bit slower than expected. Good for its price, though. Screen resolution is low. Version I got has IR

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, White)
Reviews.Author: Carlos Samuels "CARLOS SAMUELS"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this Samsung Tab 3!! I mostly use it for web, games and apps. I take it to work and use it on my hr lunch break, I showed it to some of my co-workers and they love too and wanting one like mine now : ) I think it was worth the price. It's easy to use, easy to carry around even not heavy. Only thing I don't like is that there's no flash for the camera but the camera is good for pictures in daylight.

Reviews.Title: Tab 3 rocks
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Weir
Reviews.Content: Samsung is rocking the products lately.  I have this devise and the Note III whoc both work amazingly well! Super product.

Reviews.Title: SUPER DEAL
Reviews.Author: Trent D. Freed "Tman"
Reviews.Content: Great price and great tablet so far. Really enjoying it and couldn't find a better deal locally in the stores

Reviews.Title: More than convenient
Reviews.Author: Bog Flynn
Reviews.Content: Bought this towards end of last year.  Love this tablet.  Useful feature is infrared port - makes it ultimate remote.  Battery life is phenomenal.  Watched a movie through Netflix and wasn't fully charged.  When finished, I thought battery icon would be empty.  It was actually still towards top!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Package
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel Osei-Owusu
Reviews.Content: Was delivered right to my door stepExcellent condition. Great job!!! The tab looks cool and it was the perfect present for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, White)
Reviews.Author: Frank J. Klimekoski
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace my Next Book tablet that quit working after three months. The Samsung is, by far, superior to my old tablet.The included Apps make it compatible to an iPod.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for an affordable tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet primarily for reading. It works great for ebooks. I've downloaded several from Amazon and use the Kindle app. Touch screen has a delay that's very annoying. Sometimes it doesn't even work. But since I use my laptop for internet, it's not that big of a deal.

Reviews.Title: Very nice device.
Reviews.Author: Harriet C. Forster
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Tab was a gift for my husband's birthday.  I am very impressed with the easy of operation and the speed.  Display is very clear and size is good.  I had an iPad and actually like this device better.

Reviews.Title: daugher-in-law loves this
Reviews.Author: Sheila M. Gerber
Reviews.Content: looked everywhere to purchase one of these for my daughter-in-law and finally decided that this was the bet price.  She was interested in an HD Kindle and used my Galaxy tablet.  She immediately changed her mind about the other product.  We found this to be the best price and it shipped quick and was here in time for Christmas.  She loved it.

Reviews.Title: Did not work with non-broadcasting WiFi AP
Reviews.Author: IT Ed
Reviews.Content: The device would not connect with non-broadcasting WiFi access points, even when added manuallly with assigned IP adddress.  Worked fine when the WiFi was broadcasting, but went to 'connection out of range' if the AP was switched to non-broadcasting.  Tried it with several WiFi AP's, but all had basically the same problem with all.Returned to Samsung for service, but they sent it back with the same problem.  (The repair statement said they did a software update, but the device was up-to-date before I sent it in.)Returned it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Horrible customer service from amazon vendor
Reviews.Author: N. M. Robinson "N. M. Robinson"
Reviews.Content: We bought two of these. One works perfect and deserves 5 stars but the other one stopped working after 1.5 weeks. I contacted the company I purchased this from on here and since I did not have the original box of the tablet to return this item in they would not take it back. I had all the stickers and labels and believe they should have worked with me so I can return this but they would not at all so make sure you read the return policy when you purchase this item. My daughter was very upset about this and I truly could not have afforded to get her another one this shortly after Christmas. I called Samsung directly and they came to the rescue. They send me a ups label to return this for repair free of charge and the tablet was back in our home working wonderfully within 10 days. Please regard my 1 star rating solely concerns the customer service of the vendor I purchased this from. Samsung itself gets my highest recommendation for their customer service. My kids enjoy their tablets very much.

Reviews.Title: Great device

Reviews.Content: Bought this for my niece, she was very happy, it is a great tablet best on the market very user friendly, I love samsung.

Reviews.Title: As expected!
Reviews.Author: KG
Reviews.Content: Samsung always delivers a reliable product! If you have used any Galaxy phones in the past then you will have no problems navigating this tablet. Don't expect iPad production because it's not the same! I am not a fan of Apple products because it's too exclusive so this works wells for me .If you're looking for a small tablet to get the job done, then you should have no problems with this! You can always add extra memory with a SD card so that is a plus! The battery could be a little better but you can get a good 5-6 hours but not the 8hrs that is advertised. If I had to make the decision to buy this again I would, but I would get the 8in screen instead. Sometimes I want a little more screen space but for the price you can't complain. Most tablets do the same thing but cost a lot more. This is a cost efficient way to get a reliable tablet without the extra overhead!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price - BUT NO OPTION TO MOVE/INSTALL APPS TO SD
Reviews.Author: Gi Smile
Reviews.Content: It's a good tablet for the price. But beware - it has only 8gb of memory - the system uses like 3gb and you have 5gb for apps. No option to move or install apps to SD card. Pictures, videos and and music can be stored on external SD, but the apps install only to internal memory. So we ran out of room for apps in a week, but for a 6 year old to use this tablet is fine, we just remove the apps that we don't use anymore and add new ones.

Reviews.Content: This is a great device and I don't see why everyone keeps complaining about the screen resolution. It looks fine. It performs very well and has a nice sleek design to it. The menus are set up great and it performs very well. My apps are just as good and some are even better on this than my ipod touch. It is a great price at $170 new and cheaper refubrished. My problem is that when I move away or even if im sitting right in front of it and just turn to pull down my desk thing it will break off from wifi and im not sure if it's the tablet or wifi because everything else in my house is fine even a 3 year old Dsi. Other than that it's a great device and would reccomend it to anyone.

Reviews.Author: WendynSky "WendyP"
Reviews.Content: I'd give this tablet 5 stars, it's pretty in white, light weight, can do SO much (email, apps, Google plus, music, networking..) but unfortunately after 1 week and 2 charges it's sent to Samsung for repair. Glad it's under warranty and upon calling Samsung, they were very accommodating. (I assume charging issues area typical malfunction, quick to diagnose) *Amazon 's price & shipping were amazing of course! (We have 2 Kindle Fires, but my daughter was ready for more memory & to go outside of the box so to speak, adding her Google accounts & having the camera/video also extra storage with the SD card option) But as the #1 gift of the season in my house, I am disappointed to be going without it for 3-4 weeks after only 1 week enjoying it. (And loading it with fun apps from Amazon & Google as well as our daughter's favorite music downloads!) Thank you Amazon, hoping I can update my review when we get this Tab back & add the 5th star...hopeful, I've always been happy with Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet but needs an update
Reviews.Author: Shadow
Reviews.Content: The tablet itself is good and very easy to use.  It does what most tablets don't. And the best part is the micro sd card for additional storage.  The only issue is that it didn't have sbeam like the GS4 to make things esier to share and it is very hard to update to the newest version of android.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Bogdan Plesa
Reviews.Content: A good tablet, but more ram memory would have been fine. Otherwise good quality for the price, a great travel companion.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "mb"
Reviews.Content: I'm a Apple user that is being converted to Samsung.  Family got the phones so I decided to try out this tablet.  I really like it and will be adding a galaxy phone to go with it soon.Pros:  Bigger; nuff said.  Really like the homescreens and especially the "widgets" that have active content on them,  unlike just the icons only like Apple does.  Plus the Google Play store (read: Apple App store) gives away free stuff!Cons: Well, it could be bigger.  The screen seems to attract lint and junk. Wish I could change the volume on the screen instead of having to do it with the buttons on the side.

Reviews.Title: its out of date with new icecream update
Reviews.Author: Brandie Hootsell
Reviews.Content: So slow I cannot type without words mixing up or letters missing, internet connection...beyond slow.  I wish i could return this. Disappointed as a samsung household and samsung galaxy S3 user,

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Terresa Morales "Terresa Morales"
Reviews.Content: My wonderful husband got me this for Christmas.  It was everything I expected and more.This is an outstanding tablet that does everything it promises and so far so good. Thank you baby for giving me the best Christmas gift ever!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Happy Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this for my sister for christmas....she screamed when she opened it and its serving her well. My only problem was the lovely free shipping was via fedex ground and it took forever to get to Texas.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ana Bustamante "Cocolita"
Reviews.Content: Samsung definitely is at the forefront in technology and each device shows better and better, i love samsung and is a necessary tool and perfect work.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet for entry-level and experienced users
Reviews.Author: Johann Phillips
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my mom who isn't very tech savvy, hoping that it would be intuitive and encourage her to use digital devices and make her life a little bit easier. She's been using it for a couple of weeks now and loving it so far. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet
Reviews.Author: Cory D
Reviews.Content: Bought his for my daunghter for Christmas. She loves it. Samsung is the way to go if you cant afford a Apple tablet. Very please with the speed, weight, display, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great value and ease of use for a tablet
Reviews.Author: Marie Wujek
Reviews.Content: Great value and ease of use for this tablet, was given as a gift and the receiver loved the gift.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet value
Reviews.Author: jeb421
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tablet for the money.  It does what I want from this type of device. If you are a techie and get real deep into tablet technology this may be below what you are used to but for a inexpensive tablet for general usage this has been excellent.

Reviews.Title: Samsung galaxy
Reviews.Author: Terry W Adams
Reviews.Content: Does everything I expected and at a great price.  Least expensive one I found with a gps also.  would recommend and have recommended this to friends.

Reviews.Title: Product Rating
Reviews.Author: Stephen P.
Reviews.Content: The product was delivered in a timely manner and I as satisfied with it as whatever was displayed was what I got. The equipment works perfectly, can't complin however, the price has gone up too high so I cannot purchse another now but would like another because I'm highly satified with what I received.

Reviews.Title: would have gave 5 stars...problem here..
Reviews.Author: Il  Scalia
Reviews.Content: Tablet tethers to my cell, and it is rocket fast on the web.  Overall?  For under 200 bucks delivered  to my door not bad!!  2 weeks into use...HUGE  problem...the headphone jack went silent...started making a clicking sound only...now no sound!!  A common problem with the product based on my research.  You can go to wireless headphones...but me personally...I like hard wire so...I guess more EMF for my brain.?Positives:  No lag in key strokes, price is good... I like Samsung personally, graphics are clean, have'nt experienced pixilated screen with streaming video, size is perfect, SD card slot, more freedom than Apple products.  Again, you get your money's worth with Samsung.Negatives:  I believe a common manufacturing error has occurred with the headphone jack, as it started right out of the box and progressed to clicking alternating with working fine to now no audio at all from headphone jack.  Camera is not up to par with most Samsung cell phones from the same generation.I  will stay with the Samsung tablet due to freedom of controlling data etc...hopefully the next gen tab has a better camera megapixel like the S4...AND the headphone jack manufacture improves.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: 1MRZA
Reviews.Content: My husband truly loves his tablet.  He does not put it down. No complaints here. Good investment. We acutally compared this product before buying it.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift for my niece.
Reviews.Author: Fred J Cannon
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my niece and as such I am unable to personally attest to the functionality of this tablet or how it compares to others.  All I can say is that 2 weeks after Christmas my niece is still thrilled with this gift and thanks me profusely for it every time I see her.  I didn't know at the time when I purchased it that she is a fan of Samsung and already has a Galaxy phone, so I got really lucky there.  She is a bit more tech savvy than I am, so based on her pleasure and enjoyment of this product I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A gift that went over well
Reviews.Author: Bob Wallace
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this tablet and if she is happy with it, I am very happy.  Can do e-mail, Facebook and it has voice recognition to find web-sites. Easy to use and set up and a good value.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: AceRulz
Reviews.Content: I started using the Samsung Galaxy S4 phone a couple of months ago and decided to stick with the Samsung line for a tablet. Has all the same setup as my phone and an excellent screen. Works great and the battery last a long time. I'm very pleased with both of my Samsung products. Excellent buy

Reviews.Title: Works for me
Reviews.Author: Nigh10gail
Reviews.Content: I have read review after review about what is the best tablet. I have to say for the price this one was perfect for what I needed it for. I have not experienced any issues with my tablet picking up Wi-Fi or lagging. It does what I need it to do when I need it done. I haven't weighed it down with too many apps so that my be a factor. I use it more for leisure if that helps, and I am currently happy with my tablet.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: ac
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my techie boyfriend . and now i want one really bad. great product!

Reviews.Title: Excellent size to carry on!
Reviews.Author: Victoria Fuenmayor
Reviews.Content: It's great for it price, the only thing is that Samsung doesn't has improve the operating system. The tablet is more than fine to me.

Reviews.Title: I really love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: StrikerX67
Reviews.Content: It lost one star cause its a little overpriced for the hardware insidePros: Plays games, movies, and music really well. The screen is really nice even if its only 1024. The battery life is really nice, i got about a week of daily use on it, and 8 hours of continuous use, Touch wiz is amazing! The apps it comes with is also a plus, simply because I don't have to download them, It has a micro sd card slot which is what most tablets don't have, It has a front and back facing camera which is something i really wanted, and is small and compact so that i can fit it in every pocket i have :)Cons: The back is a fingerprint magnet, Some google widgets don't work, the cameras are not that good of quality, and the performance is kind of laggy at timesOverall this tablet is nice. I have nothing that bad with it other than I would at least like to see something greater than 1.2ghz dual core processor :(P.S. I would recommend getting the 8 inch version rather than this one if size doesnt matter to you

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Grand kids loved them. Best on market!!! Ages 9,18&19. They can do anything on them.they love all their games,texting and portability. Great product!

Reviews.Title: great multipurpose tablet
Reviews.Author: 1MTgasman
Reviews.Content: This is a great multipurpose tablet that is perfect for reading ebooks, streaming videos, searching the internet or playing games for the kids. Screen is good resolution and camera works pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up. Display is clear and easy to read.
Reviews.Author: Susan DeVore
Reviews.Content: The Gallaxy Tab 3 was very easy to set up. Repsonse time to internet is very fast and the display is clear and very easy to read.The 7" is a nice size. Easy to handle and fits in a purse or brief case very well.

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy tab 3
Reviews.Author: ted
Reviews.Content: returned  it  was advertised to have usb port  It did not. Very hard to operate  user manual 146 pages spoke mainly to cell phone not tablet Purchase google nenum and it is a great tablet  Manual clear and easy to use but  cost about $40 more got it on sale at officemax  for $215 the 32 bit verson  Ted

Reviews.Title: Tab 3 So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Shell
Reviews.Content: No complaints thus far. The item came as expected. It's been weeks and no issues with it. Good purchase. Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Slow
Reviews.Author: Trina Borja
Reviews.Content: Almost everything is great about this tablet except that it is noticeably slower than the Ipad mini. This is a great organizer but now so great to use as a browser on internet.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: I got it for my daughter and it is great. She loves the camera and video. It swipes good, and is very clear. I would buy another.

Reviews.Title: Met every expectation
Reviews.Author: Juan Pablo Goyení
Reviews.Content: It's not the most powerfull tablet in the market, but it's a very good model.Very easy to use and complete, perfect for most users.Nice design with smooth curves that makes it look awesome. Good improvement since last model.

Reviews.Title: Just O.K
Reviews.Author: Aristides Nuï¿½ez Rivero
Reviews.Content: After trying other tablets from the same budget as Lenovo pad, find the SGT 3 a little bit slower with the same applications.Also it gets warm just watching videos and the screen resolution is not according to nowadays standards...(Have to say that this was already known before I got it)For the price is O.K, specially if all you want to do is checking your email or social media without usin your laptop or pc.

Reviews.Title: Love for the tablet
Reviews.Author: Travonda Vaughn
Reviews.Content: My child have not put this tablet down yet.  It sleeps right beside her.  Lol. I made a good choice with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Tablet
Reviews.Author: Terry Robitaille
Reviews.Content: Its a wonderful tablet. Perfect size and easy too carry. Easy too use I would recommend it too family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, Gold-Brown)
Reviews.Author: kirkhen
Reviews.Content: everything i want, this tab is fast and sleek. resolution is great camera is good, the feel is very good, its worth way more than i paid for it.

Reviews.Title: I was leary...
Reviews.Author: Tah
Reviews.Content: But this turned out to be a great family purchase for just goofing around, playing game apps and watching Netflix or YouTube. Not super duper fast but it's no snail either. It doesn't lag much that I can tell. The expandable memory is nice. It's perfect size! It arrived when it was supposed to with no known issues as of now. :)

Reviews.Title: Get it!!! Get it!!!! Get it!!!
Reviews.Author: Dwayne Green
Reviews.Content: Awesome.... I brought my kid this tablet and all I can tell you that it works great and also I received product with no issues. I really mean no issues as all. No issues with any of the software. I am thinking of getting the 10.1 size for myself from this is same item provider.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet that can do it all
Reviews.Author: Naomy Villalvazo
Reviews.Content: This tablet made a great christmas gift. Recommend buying a case or rubber cover to protect it from accidental dropping. I have seen many of these tablets have the glass screen cracked and it does not look nice. Highly recommend this tablet because it is a good brand and the tablet can keep a child entertained for hours.

Reviews.Title: Worked less than a week
Reviews.Author: Trent
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these for my kids' christmas.  My daughter used her Galaxy and loved it until it shut off and wouldn't turn back on.  We even bought apps on it for her but we won't get those back.  We called Amazon.com and they said they were all sold out and could not send us a new one.  We sent broken Galaxy back to Amazon.com and got our money back but now my daughter is without a tablet.  Amazon.com now has them in stock but the price jumped up another $60-$70.  Go with an Ipad if you are willing to spend the money.  Apple has much better products!

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware, too much fun.
Reviews.Author: Nehrrrr
Reviews.Content: Really love this tablet.  Smokes Apple, perfect for on the go travel.  Love the 64GB SD slot that is easy to get to.  I can't imagine buying an Apple Tablet for all that money.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Sweeting
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical at first about the size because I thought it would be too small. However, it is compact and reliable and easy to travel with.  I'm glad I decided to purchase this.

Reviews.Title: Happy!!
Reviews.Author: Ines Marotta
Reviews.Content: We love this product, especially for the external memory. The only detail is the size is a bit small but definitely next time we buy the biggest size.

Reviews.Title: Purchase of Samsung Galazy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Joyce McConnell
Reviews.Content: Bought three of the Samsung Galaxy 3Tablets for my grandchildren for Christmas.  They absolutely loved them.  They don't want to put them down.  I probably could win "best Nana" award!

Reviews.Title: xmas gift
Reviews.Author: Steven Mills
Reviews.Content: Both of my girls enjoys them.  I purchased 2 of them so they would stop fighting over them. Thanks for the fast shipping!  Kids love them, thanks !

Reviews.Title: AAAAAAAWWWWWWWSSSSSSSOOOOOOOOMMMMMMMMEEEEEEEE
Reviews.Author: Liam
Reviews.Content: it is a very good starter tablet ,its good for on the go to take BUT listen you still need to have wifi (P.S i highlly reccomend mifi wich is a mobile hotspot!)

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Kenny
Reviews.Content: Because the product has been excellent. It's worth it. My daughter is really enjoying it with all of it's benefits.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet!
Reviews.Author: Andy Morel
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best tablets on its category right now. I got it for an excellent price and it worth it. It has a perfect size and fits your hand very well. The battery life is awesome but the UI lacks the stylus. I choosed 5 stars because it's great. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Trisha Hughes
Reviews.Content: My kids talked me into purchasing this and although I was skeptical, I really do like it, including reading books on it.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: tani
Reviews.Content: This is a good product with good quality. The price a little expensive confronting with China tablets with same parameters.

Reviews.Title: Easy handheld multi purpose social device
Reviews.Author: M. Mathews
Reviews.Content: Samsung tablet is versatile, user friendly and fully functional out of the box. Most of what I needed was pre-installed or easily configured. Setup wi-fi and I was good to go. Calendar, voice to text, alarm, browser, google apps, I've got all I need to stay informed and connected.

Reviews.Title: excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Excellent relation cost-benefits, it's very thin andThe screen is very bright, the proccesor speed is not bad bat it could be better

Reviews.Title: Excellent device to have
Reviews.Author: Beth Aldridge
Reviews.Content: It's excellent it's dependable it's awesome. Could not ask for anything better. I've really enjoyed it.very very nice to own.

Reviews.Title: Love my tablet
Reviews.Author: shatsi
Reviews.Content: I have had it since mid December and have been so happy with it! The size, color and weight are excellent to fit in my purse and travel with no complaints or problems. Easy to pack and go.

Reviews.Title: Not in the same league as the iPad mini
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Not in the same league as the iPad mini but there is a huge difference in price. It is slow and clunky in comparison and does not support the same wide range of app.  Won't work with Sky Go for instance. Word processors basic and complicated to print. It does have the advantage of being able to add more memory though. Don't entertain it if you can afford the iPad mini. Even the mini is in another league to the iPhone which is hugely overrated and problematic.

Reviews.Title: handy little gadget
Reviews.Author: Kathy Labulis
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift only had it about a month now but I love it. not electronic savey at all but I do love to shop and play games.and I can take this anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for the cost!
Reviews.Author: CoasterDave
Reviews.Content: Got this tablet for $149.  Great deal, works great and has most the features you would expect from a Samsung tablet, the buttons at the bottom are a major upgrade over the Galaxy Tab 2.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet and functionality
Reviews.Author: missy4045
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet and functionality. The connectivity and apps are as exceptional as my daughter's phone, also a Samsung Galaxy. Quick shipping as always. I love working with Amazon direct.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: RENE CID
Reviews.Content: My 11 year old child like it a lot, it's the perfect size for her and she can carry it in most of her bags and purses.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Tablet
Reviews.Author: Daniel Felipe Tobon
Reviews.Content: Works very well, fast and never have a bug. long battery and run all kinds of apps, im so happy with this one

Reviews.Title: Totally love
Reviews.Author: Angel "Rose"
Reviews.Content: Have been researching tabs and I totally love this tab, I am awaiting the 64 gb micros sd card I ordererd . I can take all medical stuff with me to dr once I scan them.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Leticia Garcia
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use for my 7 year old daughter and so convenient! It's a really good tablet I highly recomended to anybody!! It's great! I love it and my daughter love it too!!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: larry williams
Reviews.Content: I like this tablet it is great.I would recommend it to anyone that wants a tablet that does cost a arm and leg..

Reviews.Title: excelent device
Reviews.Author: Freddy
Reviews.Content: I really like it easy to carry up and all things do i need to do are in this Device, fasly to use

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: T in Texas
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet fr my son for Christmas. He absolutely loves it. Very easy to use and works beautifully.

Reviews.Title: Love this and love Samsung
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet.  We bought it for my eight year old son after purchasing the Samsung Galaxy II last year.  This size is great for a child and I even borrow it from him sometimes.  He can store music on it and play tons of games from Google Play Store.  I would recommend purchasing a case to protect this.

Reviews.Title: Nice starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Samuel Petrone
Reviews.Content: I wanted something to watch netflix and to mess around with on the go but nothing to fancy or too big. this is perfect for that.

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: Agustin Salazar
Reviews.Content: I bougth it as a present for my sister and she really love it.  for the price is a very good purchase

Reviews.Title: Got it for my six year old
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Kostecki
Reviews.Content: My 6 year old daughter got it for Christmas. I love it. So easy for her to use and just the right size for a little one. I only wish there were more parental controls built in, but overall it works well for playing apps and watching videos

Reviews.Title: PERFECT TABLET!!!
Reviews.Author: Raul E. Cardenas "Raul Cardenas"
Reviews.Content: Easy to operate, great for videos which and the internet!!  I highly recommend this device to anyone looking for an easy tablet to operate.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Tab 3
Reviews.Author: LATOYA SMITH
Reviews.Content: I love it works perfect, my seven year old son is enjoying the various apps and I found them interesting and enjoying.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: deena
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Bought it as a Christmas gift for my son.  It has beautiful graphics on it's crystal clear screen and it super fast!  Perfect for gaming and internet browsing.  Would definitely recommend this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with mySamsung Galaxy Tab 3
Reviews.Author: Harold L. Weaver
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to learn to operate the Galaxy Tab 3 It is also very handy to have the information close at hand and in such a small Package

Reviews.Title: UNHAPPY CUSTOMER... Defective item!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Luvian
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my husband because I own the same one. I have already had to return it once and am going to do so again for the second time. There is a defective spot on the screen that is very visible. I want this tablet but it's becoming rather inconvenient for us to return the same item AGAIN! Am I the only one that one that received a defective item from this seller????

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Dawn Barnhart
Reviews.Content: it was what I expected so I am happy it was a xmas gift got it to be rebrised by a chartiey organization for my sister who has downs

Reviews.Title: Homerun Christmas present for my granddaughter.
Reviews.Author: RICK SLAGLE
Reviews.Content: Our 11yr old granddaughter has hardly put it down. The 8g internal and with external storage is sufficient for her games and creativity apps.The Tab 3 7-inch is the perfect size for adult or child. I have a Galaxy S4 phone and while setting up some of the tablet apps I decided I'll be getting one for me. It's easy to hold and the larger screen is great of course.

Reviews.Title: Great tablets
Reviews.Author: Deanna Crump
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic tablet.  Got one for each of my pre-teen and teen grandsons and they all love them.

Reviews.Title: galaxy tab 3
Reviews.Author: Michelle Schwartz
Reviews.Content: Bought the 7" for my 7 yr old and she loves it.Easy for her to carry around (of coarse with protective cover). Also itis easy to use. I got her the white and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Brown
Reviews.Content: Especially for the price, this tablet is everything I was hoping for. I had bought cheaper tablets in the past, and kept my fingers crossed that this one wouldn't be like the others. It does everything! Lightweight. The battery lasts quite a while. All apps work. The sound is great. The two way camera is am awesome feature and the pics are decent! GooglePlay is awesome...my daughter has all the music, books, and games she's looking for. Only drawback is you definately need to get an external memory card. Not really a drawback against the tablet and it's features, but if you want to store games and movies and such, I def recommend upping the memory. I would HIGHLY reommend this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Nice unit!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Hood
Reviews.Content: I'll say this little tablet does a great job. My 9 yr old has never been happier with a tablet.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael oconnor
Reviews.Content: Tab 3 7 inch works well. Bluetooth and wifi work great. Battery life is good also. The tablet is a little slower than s4 phone but when connected to a good wifi  its hardly noticeable.  Battery charge is a little slow but no big deal. My 5 year old has not put it down sense she got it for x mas. Wish the apps could be stored on sd card. 8 gb of internal storage fills up fast. Got all her favorite movies on sd card for her to watch. Great starter tablet. If you're a novice I suggest spend a little more money on a different tablet.

Reviews.Title: This tablet is amazing
Reviews.Author: Paola
Reviews.Content: This tablet is according to the wished is very nice . I bought this tablet for my children and they are very happy

Reviews.Title: Good table, reasonable price
Reviews.Author: KHY
Reviews.Content: Good size table which you can put in your pocket easily,  with Sd card capabilities and reasonable price. Great battery life

Reviews.Title: Very good device
Reviews.Author: Thomas Franks
Reviews.Content: Very good price from Amazon. The lowest I have seen for this tablet.The processor seems a little slow and the memory could be boosted but everything was as I expected.

Reviews.Title: Same thing as IPad so get it
Reviews.Author: Tranaya Walker
Reviews.Content: Brought this for my 7 year old son that's into the apple products. Since I'm a single mother I can't afford the iPad. This tablet does everything maybe more then iPad he downloads apps to make voice calls a lot of education games. It's affordable and he says it's better then iPad.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL.
Reviews.Author: Richard Doss
Reviews.Content: Its great.  Does so much more than I expected.  Hard to believe you get this much Technology for only $150.  Great buy through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Sandra Finnegan
Reviews.Content: I bought four for my grandchildren.  Originally bought another brand for a cheaper price.  Returned them and purchased these.  I am so glad I did.  Nice display, very easy set up and young children are able to use with ease.  Many compatible apps to choose from in the app store, including free.  Best gift of the holidays.  I get to talk with my grandchildren every day with the Skype app.

Reviews.Title: sister loves it
Reviews.Author: liz cuningham
Reviews.Content: bought as xmas gift, my sister loves it,prompt delivery, everything working.many apps and goodies, would definitely buy again,nice gift. thanks

Reviews.Title: present
Reviews.Author: graham morris
Reviews.Content: she loved it thanks uses it all the time gets alot of fun out of it keeps her quiert thank god for that

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Dawn Mills
Reviews.Content: This was the only item on my sons Christmas list. We gave in and bought it for him. He absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Kazah Kantiok
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet and the many things that it can do, I especially love the remote feature to be able to turn ON and OFF the TV as well as the cable/satellite receiver. My kid loves playing games on it as well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch,White)
Reviews.Author: Frances Mathews
Reviews.Content: Very easy to take to places where you want to take pictures, the draw back is it do not take a very clear picture. Other than that it's nice. Still shared it with others.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, White)
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I received this from my husband for Christmas to replace my Kindle HD that I loved but thought it wasn't comfortable to hold when reading in bed. This has made me totally happy since I have so many Samsung products because I believe they are the best and put Apple products to shame so I am thrilled to have this to add to my collection. I did have the problem at first with connecting to my home network but after doing the update as I had read about online it has been working perfectly. The screen is awesome so it makes everything much easier to read and enjoy pictures of mine or online in websites. I highly recommend this to anyone in the market for a small tablet and for the price you can't go wrong. But I also recommend anyone looking for a cell phone with the most awesome picture quality that you check out Samsung Galaxy Note 3 because it is by far untouchable. Thank you Amazon for all that you do for your customers.

Reviews.Title: Almost as good as Tab 2
Reviews.Author: Joseph E. Repasky
Reviews.Content: I like this product OK.  Bought it as a Christmas gift since I already own and am satisfied with my Tab 2. It specs out better than the tab 2, but I admit I am hooked on soft keys.  I do not like having the physical keys since I have a child.  I can at least hide the soft-keys for my three-year old so she doesn't get into my work email by accident. (or is it an accident? :)  ).

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Romaira Santos
Reviews.Content: This was really what I wanted. Good product and great quality. Definitely I'm glad with my purchase. I love it

Reviews.Title: Exceptional Tablet
Reviews.Author: L. Petti

Reviews.Title: I Love This Thing
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I was looking at quite a few 10.1" Android Tablets under the $250 mark but left a 7-8" option open if I found a decent one . I couldn't pass up $149.00 shipped , using Prime . I have a Samsung Centura phone so I was easily familiar with the operating system and functions . Out of the box this tablet is awesome and does the things I want it to do . It's lightweight , battery life is pretty damn good around the 8/hr. mark depending on applications running and usage . It charges quickly like most Samsung products and comes with a nice Samsung-branded charger .The only thing I wish it had , is the Multi-Window feature found in the Samsung Tab3 8" and possibly the 5MP rear Camera of the 8" , since this one is only 3MP . I think a fair competitor would be the ASUS Google Nexus 7" which has a NVIDIA Tegra 3 quad-core processor and is priced in the same range . I am very happy and would definitely recommend this Tablet to first-time users and those wanting something smaller but very capable .

I also have a Samsung Galaxy S4 phone, and they are laid out identically.  That's a bonus!

Reviews.Title: Slow and Antiquated.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer H.
Reviews.Content: I was shocked to find that this tablet is unable to play Netflix movies. As a tablet that is advertised as a device to be used for "watching the latest movies and TV shows, reading digital books, playing games, and more," one might expect that it would be capable of using the most popular/well-known/highly-used movie streaming service in the world. I didn't check if this device had a Netflix app before buying because I honestly didn't consider the possibility that ANY tablet at this point would be sold without it. In addition, I found the OS for this tablet to be quite slow, and it took a rather long time to load any webpages or attempt to download anything. I tried it on several different wifi networks available to me just to be sure that it wasn't my home wifi - it was slow no matter what. I am returning this and buying an iPad, which I should've just shelled the extra money out for in the first place.

It is a much better size for carrying with you while travelling and therefore better to have on hand for picture taking.My new S4 takes great pictures, but sometimes I like to have something a little bigger ... I am a huge photo nut and this is important to me... in fact I know of 3 others that actually bought and returned solely due to the lack of a light for the camera.Also a little slow on the processing speed.Samsung just needs to add a light and increase processing speed and it would be a perfect tablet.That being said, perfect for the newbies or people that don't live on their electronics...like my mother :)

Reviews.Title: Pretty good - (Revised my review after more use and  research.)
Reviews.Author: bobn
Reviews.Content: UPDATE:  I've now used the tablet and it's pretty good - rating upgraded.  It seems to work fine for everything I've used it for.  The problem noted below (Linux/USB Mass storage) turns out to be Android 4.x related, not just Samsung.  Newer Linuxes have MTP drivers that make it useable, at least in Nautilus.  Based on all this, rating upgraded.OLDER:I have not used the tablet yet.  But I found this out when I went to copy files:  LINUX Users beware - you cannot connect this to your Linux machine and transfer files!  The phone has Windows-only drivers on it, so you can (usually) connect it to Windows and transfer files.  Extra software is required on a Mac.  Stock Android does USB mass storage by default in my experience.  I am seriously disappointed, though I will probably end up keeping it, as I have promised it to someone for Christmas and I don't have time to do a swap.

Reviews.Title: Perfect little tablet, Amazing price!

Reviews.Content: This is the perfect little tablet at an amazing price. Downgraded from Galaxy Tab 1 10.1, which I absolutely loved, but wanted something smaller that would fit in my handbag. This is definitely a good choice. Would recommend!

Reviews.Title: wonderful

Reviews.Content: Wonderful.  For the price I will never be tempted to buy apple products.  I can do anything on this android device that apple does for a fraction of the price.

Reviews.Title: Average
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: It does everything I want it to do, it just freezes and can be slow at times. As for games I have on them they are kinda slow and kick u off (sometimes). mostly use it for social sites, does good for them.

Reviews.Title: First experience shopping at Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: Karen Maharaj
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas present for my husband. I was so excited to give it to him, which i did and he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: Jody2011 "Jody2011"
Reviews.Content: Great product! Had already bought two for my kids and also have the 10.1 for a while. Fits very well in my purse, which was the main reason I bought this size. Wished the camera had a flash, though. Black Friday price made this one of the best buy in recent times.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Rocks! Loving the Galaxy
Reviews.Author: Mimi R-Y
Reviews.Content: Amazon Rocks!!! I originally ordered the Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 and when it was delivered, the packaged was open and the seal on android box was broken. Appears as if the tablet was damaged but Amazon was great in sending a new item at no additional charge. I was very pleased in how easy the return process was as this was my first time sending a device back. I love the Galaxy tab 3 and it goes well with my Samsung Galaxy S 3 Phone. The Tablet has a beautiful bright 7 inch screen making the handheld experience comfortable. It can fit nicely in my purse. It is easy and simple to set up and use. I ordered the 16 gig because that is all I need for books, music and pictures storage. I love the camera that is front faced too. It is WiFi capable and I am not obligated to sign up with any carrier. I have a kindle but brought this tablet for more extended fun use where I am able to access documents on cloud apps for handling business or school. The camera feature is nice since a IPad was out of the question for me no matter what deal was available. I love Samsung products in their lap top, camera, phone and now I have the tablet. The white color with silver trim is very nice than the normal black color devices out there. I am a satisfied customer. I buy from Amazon on a regular. Both was a gift to myself for Christmas & upcoming Birthday! I hope the basic info helps as I have not used it very long to make an extensive review. Thank you.-MRY

Reviews.Title: just what i wanted
Reviews.Author: C
Reviews.Content: does everything i want.  i can read my pdfs, docs, excels, powerpoints, play my music, get weather, read the newspaper, maps, schedule calendar, everything.  and it looks slick too

Reviews.Title: great product

Honestly, I think if college students are looking at tablets and they don't want an iPad they should come onto Amazon and buy a Samsung Tablet for a whoooole lot less!!

Reviews.Title: Exceeds expectations
Reviews.Author: Vickie Clark
Reviews.Content: As always my order arrived on time and working perfectly.  I love the Samsung  and this one exceeded my expectations. The screen is bright and clear; it is loaded with apps and is very fast.

Reviews.Title: another nice samsung tablet

The reason why I gave this tablet 4/5 stars is because it is a little slow web browsing but it gets the job done (: Id highly recommend this tablet if you are wanting something portable, with a long lasting battery 6-7 hours and something that is not really slow:)

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: bird song
Reviews.Content: First time I have ever had a tablet, and am still learning its features. So far, I really do like it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 (7-Inch, White)

Reviews.Content: Yessss, I love it! This tab is wonderful.  I can receive my personal e-mails, play games, and read books. Wao

Reviews.Title: great item

Reviews.Content: Samsung has done it again. Fantastic tablet. Fast and easy to use. Connect to WiFi quickly and seems to hold a good battery charge. Great for all the things I need it for. Upgraded from my tab 2.

Reviews.Title: Good but some Wi-Fi issues
Reviews.Author: Thomas Cross
Reviews.Content: this is a very useful piece of hardware that can sync with my samsung galaxy note II. Though there was only one problem I have experienced frequent Wi-Fi issues every time i open youtube i have to press retry until it works. Soon i will get a micro sd card to expand the memory.

Reviews.Title: Downgrading my Samsung today
Reviews.Author: Whoever
Reviews.Content: Today: taptaptaptaptaptaptaptap.......  This is me trying to type on an internet web site with my Samsung Tab 3, only all I'm doing is going tap, tap, tap because the processor can't keep up with my typing. Taptaptaptaptaptaptaptap.  It isn't like this all the time, just enough of the time that I want to SCREEEEAMMMM!!! It takes all the joy out of using this tablet. I type on the keyboard and 5 seconds later (it seems like 15) the type on the screen shows up. Repeatedly. I want to change to a new page: taptaptaptaptaptaptaptap. Or waitwaitwaitwaitwait wait. Whichever I have the patience for. I have tried to like this tablet but it lags waaaay too often. I bought an iPad Air last week, and it is FANTASTIC. Yes, it cost a lot more, but it is The Real Thing. I skipped right over the Samsung 10" for two reasons. It cost so much I decided it wasn't worth the bother. If they can't get the 7" right why bother with the 10"? Second, the iPad Air is just sooo much sharper than anything else. Really, don't buy this. It's very annoying. I find hard to believe the any model is an improvement.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tab!
Reviews.Author: Noel Vargas
Reviews.Content: The surprising truth is that the new Samsung Galaxy Tab 3. its ediseño is great and its features are excellent ..! very happy with the team ..!

Reviews.Title: good tablet but dnt let it fall
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I had a kindle fire hd, and it was stolen, so I bougut the samsung galaxy tab 3, 7 inch. I must admit the picture quality is great on the samsung. Browser is very fast, and it picks up my wifi from far. My main problem is after a few weeks an 1 small fall, I cannot hear but a very low sound from my speakers, :-(  I think it's flimsy if this happened,  especially since I have it in a case. My kindle didn't even have a case and was more sturdy. Wished I lived in Canada so I could take it back to the retailer. I guess its a  good buy but dnt let it fall!

Reviews.Content: It has been a month since I bought this product and so far so good. I had only one incident where the tablet froze but I followed the manufactures guidelines and it was working again and I have had no further problems with it.It's perfect for college life since it is only 7" and it isn't bulky at all. So far so good, I am quite pleased!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Joseph M. WIegand
Reviews.Content: Love my tablet its small enough to be so portable and yet large enough to view movies and has a great pictureSo glad I choose this highly recommended

Reviews.Title: great tablet

Reviews.Content: great tablet it fits great in my purse only wish i knew how to synch it with my 10.1 table. I'm happy

It comes with a wordprocessor ap, Polaris Office, which is excellent for our needs. We are very happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Content: I use it instead of my laptop. I love it.  You can't save some stuff but you can keep it by taking a screen shot of it.  Very handy!

Reviews.Author: A. Reyes
Reviews.Content: Este dispositivo llego a tiempo y en las condiciones que ofreció Amazon, el color y la nitidez de la pantalla son increibles, muchas aplicaciones para todos los gustos y sobre todo la aplicacion de hablar directamente al equipo lo hace genial. Lo unico que extrañé es que no tiene SIM card, con eso seria completo, por eso no le doy un 5.This device arrived on time and under the conditions offered Amazon, color and sharpness of the display are incredible, many applications for every taste and especially the application to talk directly to the equipment makes it great. The only thing I missed is that no has SIM card, with that would be complete, for this I not give it a 5.

Reviews.Title: perfect

Reviews.Content: The perfect gift for my mom and this is it.whAt more can i say it is the best gift for moms

Reviews.Title: I love this product!

Additional to that, is my favorite brand electronic products, so I will say it is great. The only detail is that I do not get a line that allows me to access the Internet without having a WiFi nearby.

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet it is my first so I am getting use to it so far it works for me although I not a computer wiz so everyone experience would be different
